description: A report makes 10 recommendations to the government after the flooding of Laxey in October 2019.
title: More than 4,000 Manx properties 'at risk of flooding'
title_page: More than 4,000 Manx properties 'at risk of flooding' - BBC News
maintext: More than 60 properties were damaged in Laxey when water spilled through a hole in the river wall, which was being used as access to the watercourse.
